Cultures/periods: 27th Dynasty (? Date 26th-27th Dynasty suggested by Quack, JEA 85 (1999), p. 153.)
Curator's comments: The text is written in hieratic script. Each line contains a Middle Egyptian and an early demotic (in hieratic script) version of the same text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (56142) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/56142)
Quack 1999 / A new bilingual fragment from the British Museum (Papyrus BM EA 69574)
